review:
[h1]爹味的策划 狗屎的客服[/h1]
我与OW国际服打交道已经接近七八年了。

1.我已经在明确没有开挂影响他人的情况下被封停了两个账户，非常巧合的是在我充值了约1000人民币之后第二天就被封停。且客服态度极其傲慢，大多是机器回答。这种情况不是个例，我的朋友只打快速娱乐6年的老号也仅因“违反游戏规则”被封禁。望各位想充钱的三思。

2.这个游戏他所谓的游戏平衡倒不如说是一种教你怎么玩，你必须遵守他们的想法与规矩，而不是玩家为导向的。譬如技能的效果 CD 持续时间可能一个赛季就是一变，导致玩家措手不及。例如路霸从极度强势到现在基本没法用，希格玛无法秒人，天使的极度增强到连着削弱，安娜瓶子三个赛季三个效果时间，两个初始治疗量等等。

3.每个版本都有所谓强势组合，试问他们所谓的平衡平衡了个几把？你想赢就得按照这么玩，一个游戏变成一个套路，一种模式，非常无趣。

4.完全不顾及用户感受，我打个比方，游戏内语音掉麦问题，已经持续多少年了？用战网客户端的时候，更新卡初始化，卡1kb的速度，多少年了？这些问题我查阅了相关论坛，存在着大量中外文反馈，没有任何修复的动作。

5.糟糕的平衡制度，当你一路顺利的游戏，就会开始给你排奇葩队友。于是乎玩这个游戏就好像是一种修行，一种受虐。问题不在于你，但你赢不了，你表现的再好也只能是输，于是越来越多的人索性划水，最终退游。

我现在还玩这个游戏的原因很简单，这里面有我的青春。我最近又联络上16年OW亚服认识的朋友，与其说是游戏，倒不如说现在更像是聊天了。
The only good thing about this piece of shit game is the porn. Don't bother playing this trash.

As someone who fell in love with this game the first time i touched this game (2017) and still love it lot to the point where i consider it my favourite game in the world, i am so dissapointed with the path it has gone through, if this update was just a side update that was made for the sake of having extra content it would be perfect, but this is something everyone has been waiting for so many years, TF2 and OW are 2 very different games but having 1000+ hours on each game has showed me that TF2 is just more fun overall, really dissapointed with this and it's insane how people still defend this ''poor indie company that clearly doesn't have the resources to implement what they promised'', only good thing about this game being on Steam is the fact that you don't need the horrible Battle.net app

I love Overwatch, i always will and i miss it a lot, but this is unacceptable.

Fun fact: Have you noticed that the battlepass now has barely any content? it always was low on content but now specially it looks like there are barely any skins, which is because now the other options for the mythic skin need to be unlocked through the battlepass, you don't unlock them all at last level anymore, absolute insanity, thanks blizzard!

[h1] Terrible, incredibly greedy company. [/h1]

Instead of updating Overwatch 1 and giving it the attention it so desperately needed they pretty much refused to update the game for many years (besides from releasing echo) and worked on Overwatch 2 instead. The game is a huge downgrade and is just a huge cash grab for Blizzard. 

They knew PvE was scrapped but decided not to tell the players so they could probably get some more money before announcing the big PvE mode is done. They then release this invasion mode... a completely dumbed down version of what was promised.

Time and time again all they do is release awful patches, some good things are overlooked by terrible balance changes and it makes the game feel terrible to play a lot of the time. Releasing over-tuned heroes is also a Blizzard classic at this point and it's tiring. This team have barely any idea on what they're doing and it so clearly shows in this game. 

To top things off their support team is completely and utterly USELESS, after getting my platinum border main account of 6 years permanently banned for absolutely zero reason, I contacted support and was wondering what the reason was, I sent 10 appeals and every single one was hit with bot responses. It's been 6 months and I still have zero clue on what I did to deserve this ban, and they refuse to speak on the reasoning so I've given up.

This is what Overwatch, a game I very much loved for many years has come down to: a joke...

TL;DR its a greedy cash grab, Activision Blizzard is a garbage company
O jogo é ótimo, o hate é apenas com a blizzard.

OK, I'm breaking my character of the funny internet guy to tell you to NOT BUY ANYTHING ELSE THAT ISN'T THE INVASION BUNDLE. The only reason why is that the higher ups at Blizzard are trying to squeeze every single dollar out of your wallet, and every our of your free time. The Story Mode that they originally planned for this game is left in bits and pieces and then locked behind a paywall so you can cough up your hard earned cash to there predatory and downright disgusting micro-transactions.

 I started playing when it launched back in 2022 without any prior experience with the first one, I was excited to try this out and see why people called it the best Hero Shooter of the decade, only to find a hollow shell of a great game filled with $20 skins, barely any content, and a horrible Battle-Pass with no good rewards that aren't skins and critical Heroes locked behind it. I tried to give this game a fair shot, but the game had other issues as well, like a horrible matchmaking system for casual play, and the lack of anything fun that isn't casual and ranked. The way you unlock new Heroes is also very excruciating. You have to win 32 matches for each new hero by playing the class there from, but you can't do these simultaneously like every other quest in the game, you have to do each by itself for a total of 192 SEPERATE MATCHES THAT YOU HAVE TO WIN. and once the season ends, the new Hero will also be included with that with 32 more matches to win. and guess what, you can bypass this by paying $10 per hero, roughly the same price for the Battle Pass.


The amount of crap that this game throws at you just to come off as a "Sequel" is laughable. And we shouldn't be blaming the crew for this. They have been trying there best to keep us satisfied while dealing with the higher ups and there constant chicanery. The only reason why I said you should get the Invasion Bundle is so you can get the game they want to make. And who knows, if we could all not buy anything else and just get the Story Missions, we can show them what game we want, not what we have.

El silencio invadió todas las casas de Italia, sobre el campo, Roberto Baggio miraba hacia el suelo con los brazos en jarra, no era una simple imagen de derrota, era, como si aquel prodigio hubiese perdido su alma.
Nunca antes se había visto una imagen tan desoladora sobre un campo de fútbol... en sus ojos podía verse la tristeza infinita, la representación de un sueño frustrado, la promesa rota de un niño que un día le prometió a su padre algo que no le pudo dar... nada ni nadie pudieron consolarle durante más de 5 años.
Tras aquel partido en Italia comenzó a popularizarse una frase que dice:
"Socrates murió envenenado, pero Baggio murió de pie".

Ingredients:

1 pound sweet Italian sausage, sliced

3/4 pound lean ground beef

1/2 cup minced onion

2 cloves garlic, crushed

1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes

2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste

2 (6.5 ounce) cans tomato sauce

1/2 cup water

2 tablespoons white sugar

1 1/2 teaspoons dried basil

1/2 teaspoon fennel seed

1 teaspoon Italian seasoning

1/2 teaspoon salt

1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper

How to Make: In a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat, cook the sausage, beef, onion, and garlic until well browned; drain fat. Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, tomato sauce, and water. Mix in sugar and season with basil, fennel seed, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.

How to apply sauce:

I just cant support the way Blizzard have handled this franchise. The Overwatch IP could EASILY be my favourite IP of all time, but unfortunately it has been fumbled beyond belief. I really really hope in the future it can become what it truly could be, but it is beyond far away from reaching that goal. Awful handling of OW1 while OW2 was being "developed". Repeatedly confusing marketing as to what OW2 is and was supposed to be. Cancelled/heavily simplified PvE, much to everyone's disappointment. Horrible monetisation with industry leading outrageous prices. I could rant for hours. It just feels like what we got vs what it was SUPPOSED to be are just an unfathomable distance apart. Easily the most disappointed ive been with a franchise thus far. I pray that Blizzard realise this and fix it in the coming years.

Система подбора игроков в рейтинге — как игровые автоматы в казино. Если победил 4-5 раз подряд, готовься пососать 10 раз без перерыва. И это не то, что от тебя зависит. В одной игре будет очевидно, что силы команд не равны, в следующей вылетит тиммейт или будет тролль, который всю игру фидит. Или читер в команде противника. Игра сделает все, чтобы ты не победил этот матч. 

После того, как тебя смачно отжахали в задницу, алгоритмы дадут тебе пряник — одна-две победы против очевидно более слабой команды. А может и не дадут, просто страдай. 

Баттл-пасс — это что-то на богатом. Накопить на него фармом это приключение на несколько месяцев. Я купил свой первый пасс спустя 11 месяцев фарма. Это всего 1000 монет. А скины там в магазине по 2000-3000. 

Но даже при всех минусах, у этой игры нет достойных аналогов.

当时最开始接触到时候还是16年，那个时候还是高中时期。
想一想当时的万圣节，还有动感足球，活动一出看着各式各样的皮肤，和新活动，那真是兴奋地不得了。
从当时的懵懂瞎玩，到后来的奶位大师，C T钻石。真的是感慨万千。
仍记得第一赛季打排位的时候，心惊胆战的，那个时候排位分也就两位数。
后来活动 地图 新英雄，都是蜗牛速度，让游戏处于一种半死不活的状态，当时也一时兴起加入过铁拳大军，也尝试多玩一些好玩的奇葩套路。
现在打开游戏，随便打几把，发现自己手感还在，偶尔也能打出个全场最佳。队友一个个虽然顶着新号带着初始皮肤，但是没把质量都很高，愣是给人一种排位的感觉。我估计和我一样上线怀念的人不在少数。
但是看到曾经全免费的英雄现在需要花金币甚至RMB解锁，（也许多打几十把可以免费？我不知道没那个耐心）就感觉一阵失落，连擅长的英雄都是锁着的，突然就没有打下去的欲望了。
打了几把，用系统给的安娜帮队友打几个激素刀，又用源氏试了一次激素刀哪了个三杀，打一打T 打一打奶。没有人语音给压力，（至少我没这个功能，得打10把才行）惬意，也挺好。
有那么一刻，想要多玩一玩，看一看新英雄，新皮肤其实也不错，但是想到曾经常用的英雄黄金枪都齐了，皮肤也是一堆，现在重新开始，确实有点接受不了，况且也知道是暴雪换个方式变相割韭菜，联想到暴雪当年的做为，便瞬间放弃了。就算是为了那回不来的648吧。
但是游戏的时候确实能唤起一丝丝回忆，有那么一瞬，仿若当年重现，旧日梦影，那是永远也回不去的青春。
游戏未来几何，已经无所谓了，也许有一天会回来然后一直玩下去，也有可能是最后一次打开这个破游戏了。
但是无论如何，烤迪克是真的傻逼。

My name is Walter Hartwell White. I live at 308 Negra Arroyo Lane, Albuquerque, New Mexico, 87104. This is my confession. If you're watching this tape, I'm probably dead– murdered by my brother-in-law, Hank Schrader. Hank has been building a meth empire for over a year now, and using me as his chemist. Shortly after my 50th birthday, he asked that I use my chemistry knowledge to cook methamphetamine, which he would then sell using connections that he made through his career with the DEA. I was... astounded. I... I always thought Hank was a very moral man, and I was particularly vulnerable at the time – something he knew and took advantage of. I was reeling from a cancer diagnosis that was poised to bankrupt my family. Hank took me in on a ride-along and showed me just how much money even a small meth operation could make. And I was weak. I didn't want my family to go into financial ruin, so I agreed. Hank had a partner, a businessman named Gustavo Fring. Hank sold me into servitude to this man. And when I tried to quit, Fring threatened my family. I didn't know where to turn. Eventually, Hank and Fring had a falling-out. Things escalated. Fring was able to arrange – uh, I guess... I guess you call it a "hit" – on Hank, and failed, but Hank was seriously injured. And I wound up paying his medical bills, which amounted to a little over $177,000. Upon recovery, Hank was bent on revenge. Working with a man named Hector Salamanca, he plotted to kill Fring. The bomb that he used was built by me, and he gave me no option in it. I have often contemplated suicide, but I'm a coward. I wanted to go to the police, but I was frightened. Hank had risen to become the head of the Albuquerque DEA. To keep me in line, he took my children. For three months, he kept them. My wife had no idea of my criminal activities, and was horrified to learn what I had done. I was in hell. I hated myself for what I had brought upon my family. Recently, I tried once again to quit, and in response, he gave me this. [Walt points to the bruise on his face left by Hank in "Blood Money."] I can't take this anymore. I live in fear every day that Hank will kill me, or worse, hurt my family. All I could think to do was to make this video and hope that the world will finally see this man for what he really is.

I don't blame them since their skill tree amounted to just big AoE attacks and missions comprising of defend the point. Blizzard can suck on my Nutcracker Zenyatta's golden nuts.... all 8 of them!

Blizzard lied through their teeth about Overwatch 2. This is original Overwatch with worse monetisation, absolutely not worth playing.

Just go back to TF2 folks.
